verbs.description: " [ARG0: The United States] [V: continues] [ARG1: to actively prepare for President Trump 's expected summit with leader Kim in Singapore] , " White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders said .

" [ARG1: The United States continues to actively prepare for President Trump 's expected summit with leader Kim in Singapore] , " [ARG0: White House press secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders] [V: said] .
